title: Call of Duty Video Game Series
description: Call of Duty is a first-person shooter video game franchise. The series began on Microsoft Windows, and later expanded to consoles and handhelds. Several spin-off games have been released. The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, but later games like Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare are set in modern times or in futuristic settings. This Quest includes all games in the main series.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty (PC, OSX, Xbox 360, PS3)
questEntries.description: The game simulates infantry and combined arms warfare of World War II using a modified version of the id Tech 3 engine. Much of its theme and gameplay is similar to the Medal of Honor series; however, Call of Duty showcases multiple viewpoints staged in the British, American, and Soviet theaters of World War II.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty 2 (PC, OSX, Xbox 360, Xbox One)
questEntries.description: The game is set during World War II and the campaign mode is experienced through the perspectives of four soldiers: one in the Red Army, one in the United States Army, and two in the British Army. It contains four individual campaigns, split into three stories, with a total of 27 missions.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty 3 (PS2, Xbox, Xbox 360, PS3, Wii Xbox One)
questEntries.description: The game is modeled after the Normandy breakout, where the British, Canadian, Polish, American, and French Resistance forces pushed into the village of Chambois, France, also known as the Falaise Gap.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare (PC, OSX, Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, Xbox One, PS4, DS)
questEntries.description: The story takes place in the year 2011, where a radical leader has executed the president of an unnamed country in the Middle East, and an ultranationalist movement ignites a civil war in Russia. The conflicts are seen from the perspectives of a U.S. Force Reconnaissance Marine and a British SAS commando, and are set in various locales, such as the United Kingdom, the Middle East, Azerbaijan, Russia, and Ukraine.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: World at War (PC, PS2, Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, Xbox One, DS)
questEntries.description: The narrative for the campaign mode focuses on the Pacific Theater and Eastern Front theaters of World War II, involving the United States, Empire of Japan, Soviet Union, and Nazi Germany.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2  (PC, OSX, Xbox 360, PS3)
questEntries.description: The game's campaign follows the Task Force 141, a special forces unit fronted by Captain Soap MacTavish, as they hunt Vladimir Makarov, leader of the Russian Ultranationalist party, and the United States Army Rangers, who are defending the country from a Russian invasion.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops (PC, OSX, Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, Xbox One, DS)
questEntries.description: Set in the 1960s during the Cold War, the game's campaign follows CIA operative Alex Mason as he attempts to recall certain memories in combat in order to locate a numbers station, which is due to transmit broadcasts to sleeper agents who are bound to use chemical weapons across the United States.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 (PC, OSX, Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, DS)
questEntries.description: The game's campaign follows up Modern Warfare 2 and begins right after the events of its final mission. Similar to Modern Warfare 2, it is centered around the Task Force 141, which contains Captain Price, Soap MacTavish, and Yuri, one of the playable characters.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops II (PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One, Wii U)
questEntries.description: The game's campaign follows up the story of Black Ops and is set in two different time periods; the late 1980s and 2025. In the 80s, the player switches control between Alex Mason and Frank Woods, two of the protagonists from Black Ops, while in 2025, the player assumes control of Mason's son, David (codenamed 'Section').

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Ghosts (PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One, PS4, Wii U)
questEntries.description: Call of Duty: Ghosts is set in a near future that follows the nuclear destruction of the Middle East. The oil-producing nations of South America form the 'Federation of the Americas' in response to the ensuing global economic crisis and quickly grow into a global superpower, swiftly invading and conquering Central America, the Caribbean, and Mexico.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare (PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One, PS4)
questEntries.description: The game's story, featuring a futuristic setting which is set between 2054 and 2061, follows Jack Mitchell of the United States Marine Corps and his interactions with Atlas, a private military corporation that sells its services to the highest bidder.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops III (PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One, PS4)
questEntries.description: Black Ops III takes place in 2065, 40 years after the events of Black Ops II, in a world facing upheaval from climate change and new technologies. Similar to its predecessors, the story follows a group of black ops soldiers.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare (PC, Xbox One, PS4)
questEntries.description: The game's campaign is centered around a battle for the Solar System, which the Settlement Defense Front (SDF), a hostile force who are the main antagonists, are attempting to take over.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: WWII (PC, Xbox One, PS4)
questEntries.description: The game's campaign is set in the European theatre, and is centered around a squad in the 1st Infantry Division, following their battles on the Western Front, and set mainly in the historical events of Operation Overlord.

questEntries.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 4 (PC, Xbox One, PS4)
questEntries.releaseDate: It is the sequel to the 2015 game Call of Duty: Black Ops III and will be the fifth entry in the Black Ops story arc, and the 15th main installment in the Call of Duty series overall.
